title: Doctor Jen
description: Doctor Jen tells the story of family members who are ill and the doctor they visit to feel better. The one family member who cannot visit Doctor Jen is revealed on the last page of the book. The picture-to-text correspondence and familiar topics support early readers' efforts.
reviewWords: ache, cough, doctor, ill, knees, stiff
comprehension: Problem and Solution                : Identify the story elements of problem and solution
phonics: Consonant Digraphs : Read words with consonant digraph -ck
grammar: Exclamatory Sentences                : Capitalize and punctuate exclamatory sentences
wordWork: Alphabetizing                : Place words in alphabetical order
